messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
They call me an Ace Trainer.Allow me to demonstrate the talent
that makes me so!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I’m burning with jealousy over your
raw talent!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I think keeping up the effort to
better yourself is a talent in itself.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Last time, I stumbled before I could
showcase my talent.This time, I’ll conclusively demonstrate
the might of an Ace Trainer!
